Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Help
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("help", "Help Commands, what else is there to say?")]
public class HelpSlashCommand : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<HelpService>, IInteractionModuleBase
